name: Martin's Room
description:
Martin is tired of playing the same games everyday. He can't even go out to buy a new one and that makes him feel awful.

One day, Martin remembers that strange game that his uncle liked to talk about. It was something like "Pain Ball", and that doesn't sound fun at all. Anyways, he wants to try it... If his uncle likes it, it must be funny!

2 hours later, with a long phone call with his uncle included, the "Pain Ball" is ready. Let's play!

-Controls-

A - Left Flipper

D - Right Flipper

Space - Throw Ball 

Don't lose the ball and try to get your best score! Post your score in the comments so we can know who is the best player in the world!

This project was made as a University Project where I could only use specific assets.
